# mtroc

The **mtroc** package uses a two-level random-effects model for multiple imputations of missing data in meta analysis of diagnostic accuracy.

## Installation

Install **mtroc** from CRAN with:

``` r
install.packages("mtroc")
```

You can install the development version from GitHub with:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("lmaowisc/mtroc")
```

## Methodology

See [*Multiple imputations by two-level model*](https://lmaowisc.github.io/mtroc/articles/Two-level-mi.html)*.*
